tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The behavior of the doctor as well as the staff was extremely friendly and polite, made us feel at ease. He explained the procedure in a simple lucid way and the overall treatment was cost-effective as well. The cordiality and expertise of the doctor was really evident.  I wish him lots of success and happiness. We are truly satisfied with the service.
